Text: Wetherspoons continued to outperform the market with a 6.8% rise in like-for-like sales, although rising costs weighed on full-year underlying profits, which fell 4.5% to £102.5 million.
Cause: Wetherspoons continued to outperform the market with a 6.8% rise in like-for-like sales, although rising costs weighed on full-year underlying profits
Sentence: <e1>Wetherspoons continued to outperform the market with a 6.8% rise in like-for-like sales, although rising costs weighed on full-year underlying profits</e1>, which <e2>fell 4.5% to £102.5 million.</e2>
